Package org.lrdm

Class Mirror

java.lang.Object
org.lrdm.Mirror
public class Mirror extends Object
A single mirror in an RDM network. Can have the following states: down -> starting -> up -> ready -> stopping -> stopped. Each state change requires time. These times are fetched from the properties, which specify min/max ranges for them. Each mirror will randoml√∂y
Author:
Anonymous

      public boolean isLinkedWith(Mirror m)
      Checks of this mirror is linked with the other mirror either as a source or target mirror.
      Parameters:
      m - The potentielly linked mirror.
      Returns:
      True if there is a link, else false.

    • timeStep

      public void timeStep(int currentSimTime)
      Simulates a single time step in the simulation. Changes the state of the mirror if the respective time has passed.
      Parameters:
      currentSimTime - (int) current simulation time

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown(int simTime)
      Send a shutdown signal to the mirror. The mirror will change its state to stopping. After stop_time time steps, it will change its state to stopped and will be removed from the network in its timestep method.
      Parameters:
      simTime - (int) simulation time when the mirror shall be shut down
